Features

Some ARAS features are:

  • It reads mp3, wav, ogg, mod, xm and other media formats
  • It works with OSS, OSS4, ALSA, Pulseaudio, JACK and PCM streams
  • It can play files or media streams over internet, enabling the performing of automatic audio links
  • Highly configurable
  • Log file capability
  • Time signal capability
  • Interval signal capability
  • It works with single file blocks, playlist blocks, blocks of random files, blocks of one random file and interleaved blocks
  • Fade out capability and flexible scheduling
  • It is suitable for both small and big radio stations
  • It is distributed under GPL
  • It is multi-platform
